The ungrateful behaviour of the Papists, priests, and Jesuits, towards the imperial and indulgent crown of England towards them, from the days of Queen Mary unto this present Age. Denton, William, 1605-1691.
[20], 127, [15] p.
Printed for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ..., London, : MDCLXXIX. [1679]
Printer's device (globe) on t.p.; head-pieces; initials. Errata: p. [15] at end. Attribution from Wing (2nd ed.) Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of text. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
